what_it_does: Effortlessly collect contact form submissions in n8n, notify your support team instantly, and redirect users with confirmation and error handling. Learn more!
page_title: The Vibe Marketer - 10x Your Speed To Market With AI

parameters.content:
### Customize Fields 
Change the form fields, title, or descriptions in the formTrigger node.

### Customize Email 
Update the email body or subject in the emailSend node.

### Customize Message Content
Change custom html content

### Change Redirect URL 
Redirect to a different URL by editing the Redirect Form node.

### Change Message
Configure the Error Message Output to Meet Your Implementation Requirements.
